title: Sick of Support CC healers in Aram and his abilities .
body:
Remove {{item:3083}} from Aram but not remove support healers from Aram 

{{champion:44}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}}  

just take a look 
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2800075595/38496982?tab=overview

What happen when 2 support healers are in the enemy team and they have low coldown on his Ultimate (R).

replies.body: that's funny because you have one morello for your whole team... might want to reconsider your build against healing champs
Taric's one of the few champions where kiting is honestly massive counterplay, if he can't bravado proc he isn't going to get a single heal off to begin with.
Also, please note that CHAMPION HEALING IS REDUCED BY HALF and there are items that your team could have bought, morello,Thornmail,Executioners culling.
